attributes.action: Reverse the changes to the highway code
attributes.additional_details:
The changes to the highway code are dangerous and badly thought out.
The thought that a bicycle could go inside a car indicating and turning left at to speeds around 20 MPH is not safe.
Also a pedestrian can just step in front of a car doing 30MPH and the motorist is to blame is wrong.
These changes are just making motorists and insurers a scapegoat to pay for mistakes made by uninsured road users
attributes.background: Abolish the new changes to the highway code as they are dangerous

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607153
